name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven Thomas YORK, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
379 A .2d 307
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven Thomas YORK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 26, 1977.
Decided Oct. 28, 1977.
Michael A. Etkin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
